dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [67.15.191.30] Case Number: 10202
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Katherine Gardner [mailto:Katherine.Gardner@gettyimages.com] 
Posted At: Monday, November 20, 2006 4:58 PM
Posted To: DMCA
Conversation: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[67.15.191.30] Case Number: 10202
Subject: RE: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[67.15.191.30] Case Number: 10202


Thank you for your assistance in removing the requested images from the
Chicago Capital Funds website.  Unfortunately, they have replaced the
previous images with additional Getty Images' photographs that they have
not purchased.  I have attached a new DMCA takedown notice to this
e-mail for the new images.

We would like to be able to speak to the client about these
infringements, but we have had a difficult time getting in touch with a
responsible party there.  Would you be able to put me in touch with
someone from this company?

With Best Wishes, 


Kate Gardner
Copyright Compliance Specialist
Getty Images, Inc. 
601 N. 34th St.
Seattle, WA 98103
Phone: 206-925-6732
Fax: 206-925-5623
Katherine.Gardner@gettyimages.com

-----Original Message-----
From: dmca@theplanet.com [mailto:dmca@theplanet.com]
Sent: Friday, November 10, 2006 9:40 AM
To: Katherine Gardner
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [67.15.191.30]
Case Number: 10202

Your Reference Number: 
Our Case Number: 10202


, , . 

Sir, 

We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully
removed the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and have
closed the case in our records, as of 11/10/2006 11:40:02 AM. 

The offending URL(S) was:  www.chicagocapitalfund.com 
 
Infringement(s) of Getty Images' photograph(s) (the "Photograph")
has/have been detected on the Web site  www.chicagocapitalfund.com  .
The infringing photograph appears on the Web site as follows: on their
Welcome, About Us, Funds & Performance, Contact Us, and Calculator
pages. A copy of the infringing photographs is attached for your
assistance in removal..   Referencing 10202

-- 

Regards,
Abuse Team
EV1Servers.net
abuse@ev1servers.net
